original_text: Solomon the son of David established himself in his kingdom, and the Lord his God was with him and made him exceedingly great.
korean_text: 다윗의 아들 솔로몬의 왕위가 견고하여 가며 그의 하나님 여호와께서 그와 함께 하사 심히 창대하게 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Solomon the son of David established himself in his kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗의 아들 솔로몬은 자기 왕국에서 굳건히 섰습니다

sentences.original_text: and the Lord his God was with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 하나님 여호와께서 그와 함께 계셨습니다
